txt.en: <rgb=#FF0000>Completing Aiding the Eastemnet will cancel this quest</rgb>

'The mushrooms that grow within Dígelon are unique and a great source of inspiration and hope to my people. Unfortunately, the lizards and salamanders that frequent the underground river feast upon them.\n\n'Go to Dígelon and drive out the lizards. The mushrooms' inspirational powers are too important to let them be used as a meal for a salamander.'
'They will return at some point, the mushrooms are too delicious for them not to, but for now they -- and our hopes -- are safe.'
'Are you ready to brave the currents of the Dígelon?'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This is an instanced public questing area.</rgb>
The salamanders and lizards within Dígelon feast upon the mushrooms.
Defeated salamanders and lizards in Dígelon ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat salamanders and lizards in Dígelon ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The salamanders and lizards can be found in Dígelon.\n\nWulfin asked you to drive out the lizards and salamanders found within Dígelon.
Wulfin can be found in Harwick.\n\nWulfin will be pleased to hear you have driven out many of the lizards and salamanders that were within Dígelon.
